Results
We retrieved 496 records from the search (Figure 1), including 492 from the databases and four from other sources (i.e., searching the references of the included studies).

claim: We identified studies in the development (n = 1, < 1%), feasibility (n = 8, 28%), effectiveness (n = 18, 64%), implementation (n = 1, < 1%) and commercialisation (n = 13, 46%) stages (Figure 3).
title: FIGURE 3.
caption: Number of studies in each evaluation stage of the lifecycle of healthcare interventions.
